Translations.Text: Tamen shuo:`Mu sa a! Tamen zai shengdi de qijian, women jue bu jinqu. Ni he ni de zhu qu zuozhan ba! Women biding yao zuo zai zheli.'
Ta shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Chu wo ziji he wo gege wai, wo buneng zuo zhu, wo qiu ni shi women he fanzui de minzhong fenkai.'
Zhenzhu shuo:`Zai sishi nian nei, tamen bude jinru shengdi, tamen yao piaobo zai kuangye; gu ni buyao aidao fanzui de minzhong.'

Ni dang ru shidi dui tamen jiangshu a dan de liang ge er zi de gushi. Dangshi, tamen lia ge xian yi jian gongwu, zhege de gongwu bei jieshoule, nage de gongwu wei bei jieshou. Nage shuo:`Wo bisha ni.'Zhege shuo:`Zhenzhu zhi jieshou jingwei zhe de gongwu.
Ruguo ni shenshou lai sha wo, wo jue bu shenshou qu sha ni; wo dique weiju zhenzhu——quan shijie de zhu.
Wo biding yao ni danfu sha wo de zuize, he ni yuan you de zui'e, ni jiang chengwei huo yu de jumin. Zhe shi buyi zhe de baochou.'
Ta de siyu cuanduo tasha ta de didi. Gu tashale ta zhihou, bianchengle kui she de ren.

Zhenzhu shi yi zhi wuya lai jue di, yibian zhishi ta zenyang yanmai ta didi de shiti. Ta shuo:`Shang zai! Wo zen buneng xiang zhe zhi wuya nayang, ba wo didi de shiti yanmai qilai ne?'Yushi, ta biancheng huihen de ren.
